name: Bangla Number Converter
author: Jesmin Juthi

sections.description:
Bangla Number Converter plugin will help you to Converts English numbers to Bangla numbers of your WordPress website.

sections.installation:
Minimum Requirements

  • WordPress 5.7 or greater
  • PHP version 7.4 or greater
  • MySQL version 5.7 or greater
  • MariaDB version 10.4 or greater

AUTOMATIC INSTALLATION

Automatic installation is the easiest option. To automatically install Bangla Number Converter, log in to your WordPress dashboard, navigate the Plugins menu, and click Add New.

In the search field, type Bangla Number Converter, and click Search Plugins. Once you’ve found our business directory plugin, you install it by clicking Install Now.

MANUAL INSTALLATION

The manual installation method involves downloading our Directory plugin and uploading it to your web server via your favorite FTP application.

  1. Upload bangla-number-converter to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

UPDATING

Automatic updates should work seamlessly. We always suggest you backup your website before any automated update to avoid unforeseen problems.
sections.faq:
Is Bangla Number Converter free plugin?

Yes, It’s free WordPress Plugin.

Can I customize this?

Yes, It’s easy to customize.
